ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Upgrade regular bionics to make them even better. Unlocks new recipes on the bionics workbench.

rulesStrings.li: subject->advanced bionic prosthesis
subject_story->worked primarily with bionically enhanced soldiers, seeking to further potential performance values
subject_story->examined an extensive amount of collected performance data to address any unforseen defects within the existing prosthetics framework
subject_story->has volunteered to have the advanced bionic prototypes implanted, ending up as more machine than man
subject_gerund->upgrading bionic prosthetics
subject_gerund->utilizing more efficient bionic body parts

ResearchProjectDef.label: rib implants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Selectively removing portions of the costal cartilage and inserting artificially crafted rib extensions, a new concept of implants was born - with dispensers to release their contents through nano-tubes into the manubrium where they are relayed in controlled doses to the correct areas of the body.

rulesStrings.li: subject->rib implants
subject_story->pondered about the endless possibilities of experimenting with synthetic rib extensions
subject_story->had a mad inspirational moment of utilizing the ribcage to cram in micro dispensers
subject_story->became a "Ribworld" lunatic, sacrificing valuable brain processing power to make any part of it a reality
subject_gerund->crafting rib implants
subject_gerund->utilizing the ribcage for implants

ResearchProjectDef.label: surrogate organs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build inexpensive prosthetic organs to replace lost or damaged ones. Requires a skilled doctor to transplant.

rulesStrings.li: subject->surrogate organs
subject_story->had an organ replaced with a prosthetic one, to show how easy it was
subject_story->opened a clinic dealing with prosthetics
subject_story->began crafting bespoke surrogate prosthetic organs for the many war veterans in the area
subject_gerund->crafting surrogate organs

ResearchProjectDef.label: synthetic organs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further research in nano-technology allows you to print incredibly well-engineered synthetic organs.

rulesStrings.li: subject->synthetic organs
subject_story->worked primarily with cancer patients, synthesizing bespoke bionic organs so they may overcome their cancer
subject_story->studied and experimented on many human organs to better mimic their functions in a synthetic design concept
subject_story->designed various synthetic nano printing machines of various scale
subject_gerund->printing synthetic organs
subject_gerund->utilising synthetic organs

ResearchProjectDef.label: Synthetic repair
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further research into nano technology allows you to print incredibly well-engineered artificial tissues and nerves to aid with healing scars, frailty and bad backs. Unlocks synthetic tissue and neuromuscular framework recipes on the synthetic nano printer.

rulesStrings.li: subject->synthetic repair
subject_story->applied primarily to severely disfigured patients, conducting cosmetic surgeries that nigh-flawlessly restore their facial features
subject_story->studied the dermis and epidermis extensively to better understand and mimic the intricacy of skin - human and alien alike
subject_story->pushed for further precision of nano-printing technology
subject_gerund->printing synthetic tissue
subject_gerund->printing neuromuscular framework

ResearchProjectDef.label: Neurological treatment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Extensive research into nano technology allows you to print incredibly well-engineered framework kit consisting of artificial adaptable brain tissues, nerves and nanomachines to aid with countering dementia, alzheimer, chemical damage and scars in the brain. Unlocks neuro-cure framework recipe on the synthetic nano printer.\n\nNeuro-cure framework only cures dementia and alzheimer, and does not prevent it from appearing again.

rulesStrings.li: subject->neurological treatment
subject_story->volunteered for experimental surgery that successfully restored lost higher brain functions of an average Tower Hamlets dweller
subject_story->studied countless MRI scan results to better understand the human brain
subject_story->pushed the boundries for precision of nano-printing technology
subject_gerund->printing neuro-cure framework

ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: You now have the technology to print the Neuro-cure Framework - but to properly utilise it will require the Brain Surgery research.

ResearchProjectDef.label: brain surgery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to perform surgery on the brain.

rulesStrings.li: subject->brain surgery
subject_story->devised post-surgery care routines for patients recovering from a recent procedure
subject_story->operated as a brain surgeon
subject_story->examined many patients with head injuries
subject_gerund->operating brain surgery

ResearchProjectDef.label: Glitterworld implants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to make Glitterworld implants.

rulesStrings.li: subject->glitterworld implants
subject_story->supervised production at a glitterworld lighthouse factory for medical implants
subject_story->designed various AI prototypes for teaching and assisting the user directly through a brain implant
subject_story->salvaged glitterworld technology from crashed ships on a less technologically developed planet
subject_gerund->crafting glitterworld implants

ResearchProjectDef.label: AI persona core implant
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to perform the surgery to implant an AI persona core into the brain. It provides a powerful consciousness boost with the assistance of the AI, but it will require regular medical maintenance to avoid the AI turning rogue on the user.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Organic optimization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to develop nanobots to optimize and bring out the full potential of the natural body, specifically designed to aid body purists.

rulesStrings.li: subject->organic optimization
subject_story->researched for ways to assist body purists in unlocking their biological potential - all without upsetting their beliefs
subject_story->argued that body purists are not merely cannon fodder and walking organ donors
subject_story->disgusted transhumanists by working on organic optimization
subject_gerund->crafting organic optimization nanobots

ResearchProjectDef.label: MA-AI chip
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to manufacture your own MA-AI chip (Medical Assistant-AI chip), without needing to find an AI persona core.

rulesStrings.li: subject->MA-AI chip
subject_story->learned of a specialized medical assistant-AI chip as a core component in glitterworld implants
subject_story->fully reverse engineered glitterworld implants to fabricate their production on a suffiently developed planet
subject_story->was made aware of an alternate method of producing an MA-AI chip without sacrificing valuable and mysterious AI persona cores
subject_gerund->crafting the MA-AI chip
